mapper.select: SELECT A.ROW_NUM, A.GALL_NO, A.ID, A.GALL_TITLE, A.GALL_CONTENT, A.GALL_HIT, A.GALL_CREATE_DATE, A.GALL_MODIFY_DATE, A.GALL_IP FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY GALL_NO DESC) AS ROW_NUM, GALL_NO, ID, GALL_TITLE, GALL_CONTENT, GALL_HIT, GALL_CREATE_DATE, GALL_MODIFY_DATE, GALL_IP FROM ANI_BRD_GALL) A WHERE A.ROW_NUM BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ANI_BRD_GALL (GALL_NO, ID, GALL_TITLE, GALL_CONTENT, GALL_HIT, GALL_CREATE_DATE, GALL_MODIFY_DATE, GALL_IP) VALUES (ANI_BRD_GALL_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{gallTitle}, #{gallContent}, 0, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{gallIp})
